name: Sweat Theamed Idle Game
description:
Sweat Themed Idle Game

On the day of creating this game it was so hot, we could not help it, but make this sweat themed idle game. Watch out for your hydration level while you crank up the heat for the ultimate goal of collecting as much sweat as possible.

The source code could be found here: https://github.com/MrInformatic/sweat-themed-idle-game

Controls

The buttons on the left side represent your hydration options, the buttons on the right your heating options. On the top you see the current temperature. On the bottom left you see the amount of sweat and the bar in the middle represents your hydration.
